data.name: Le Blanc
data.description: A casual American style steak house in the heart of Da'an District. The best balance of quality and value Taipei has to offer. Great steak doesn't have to be reserved for special occasions anymore. We have only two options, USDA Prime Ribeye or live Boston Lobster. Both come with, a choice of soup or salad, a freshly baked popover, and all the fries your heart desires. Life's too short to eat night market steak. It's time to give quality steak back to the people. Meat to please you!
data.address: 183 Daan Road Section 1, Da'an, Taipei Taiwan

data.name: W XYZ Bar
data.description: Aloft Taipei Zhongshan boasts one of the trendiest bars & restaurants in downtown Taipei city. The signature W XYZ bar, located at the hotel top floor, is furnished with modern yet sophisticated decor and a flashy blue neon light signage. W XYZ bar, Aloft Hotels' signature bar is designed in a way, where during the day, the bar portray a lobby lounge feeling and during the night, the doors of the cabinets are turned around revealing the selection of liquor bottles.
data.address: No. 1, Shuangcheng St., Zhongshan Dist. 17F, Aloft Taipei Zhongshan, Zhongshan District, Taipei 104 Taiwan

data.description: W Taipei’s restyled WOOBAR is officially back in 2018 February and is ready to lead Taipei’s innovative cocktail culture to the next level with its restyled, refreshed and reenergized bar design and programs. To continue with the property’s design narrative of “Nature Electrified”, W Taipei collaborated with G.A Design from United Kingdom again, to amp the narrative a notch higher, presenting “Electrified Nature”.

Whether pre-dinner or a sensual evening out, linger at the YEN Bar where the surrounding art and glass installations set the scene for sophisticated socializing.

data.name: Yen Chinese Restaurant
data.description: Enjoy your journey to the "New Chinese Cuisine," welcomes to YEN, our destination restaurant on the 31st floor at W Taipei. It's Chinese gastronomy like you've never encountered before. From cooking alongside the masters of Cantonese culinary arts, our culinary team has infused classical dishes with stylish innovation to present breathtaking creations into groundbreaking interpretations - nouvelle Chinese cuisine. Reflecting the flavors of all regions in China, from fresh seafood, signature soups, delightful dim sum and sensational desserts to show off our Chinese epicurean expertise.

data.name: M.O. Bar at Mandarin Oriental, Taipei
data.description: Inspired by Art Deco influences of the 1920s, the M.O. Bar, welcomes guests with a charming island bar and a variety of intimate seating areas, including one private room. Bespoke cocktails and a wide selection of fine Champagnes and wines are served alongside light snacks in the evening. Live DJ Performance: 9:30~11:30 pm on every Wednesday and Thursday; and 9:00 pm~ 1:00 am on every Friday and Saturday. A kind reminder that the minimum spend per person on every Friday and Saturday after 9:00 pm is at TWD 800+10%. The hotel has a smart elegant dress code for both ladies and gentlemen. Slippers are not appropriate in the dining room. Gentlemen are also suggested to wear smart shirts and closed shoes.
data.address: No.158 Dunhua North Road 5th Floor, Songshan, Taipei 10548 Taiwan

data.name: The Jade Lounge

photo.caption: Located on the ground floor, adjacent to the lobby, The Jade Lounge is an elegant lounge. Benefitting from lots of natural daylight and atmospherically lit at night, The Jade Lounge provides a sophisticated spot in which to enjoy traditional afternoon tea and exquisite pastries, complemented by a fine selection of European and Chinese teas.

data.description: Located on the ground floor, adjacent to the lobby, The Jade Lounge is an elegant all-day lounge. Benefitting from lots of natural daylight and atmospherically lit at night, The Jade Lounge provides a sophisticated spot in which to enjoy traditional afternoon tea and exquisite pastries, complemented by a fine selection of European and Chinese teas.

data.name: The Kitchen Table
data.description: Come take a seat at our kitchen table, where we've opened up a world of gourmet selections featuring favorites from around the world, so take your time to explore each taste in an all-day casual, cheerful and fun dining room. At our kitchen table, we've taken the city's "yin shi wen hua" - food culture - to the next level on the 10th floor of W Taipei, where we'll take your palate on a worldwide epicurean experience from breakfast to dinner. Famous for the stylish vacation décor with bright yellow and white hues showcasing the colorful ceramic "Chrysalis" butterfly installation on the walls and the delectable dishes around the world. The kitchen table also offers an ultimate tropical escape. The interactive open kitchen is where all the creativity and love for food comes from. The journey begins with a full breakfast buffet of delectable Western and Asian dishes to start your day. At lunch, indulge in fresh and light buffet. The extensive buffet at night is simply splendid. With th
data.address: 10 Zhongxiao East Road, Sec. 5 W Hotel Taipei, 10F, Xinyi District, Taipei 110 Taiwan

data.name: Shang Palace
data.description: At the opulent Shang Palace, professional chefs from Hong Kong present fine Cantonese cuisine in a modern setting that echoes two themes - celestial clouds and the peony flower.The elegant restaurant features a wide selection of exquisite dishes. Look forward to a wide selection of dim sum favourites, available for lunch daily, and signature dishes as well as an extensive tea collection are offered at Shang Palace.The Tea Alley at the entrance features an assortment of traditional tea ware produced by Lin’s Ceramics Studio.

data.name: Mediterranean Steak House At The Riviera Taipei

photo.caption: 美國杉河農場濕式熟成50天肋眼牛排

data.description: The main dining room opens to the atrium and lends a sense of space and brightness. The interior captures the grace of southern France, Italy, and Greece as expressed in marble pillars, peach white arches, and classical chandeliers. The Mediterranean brings to guests a relaxing, comfortable dinning experience. The hearty breakfast and weekend afternoon tea buffet is served with selective choice of import goods and fresh local ingredients. Classic lunch and dinner emphasis on Chef's exceptional steak dishes, seasonal appetizers, main courses and exquisite desserts.
data.address: No. 646, Linsen North Road, Zhongshan District, Taipei 104 Taiwan

data.name: Mayur Indian Kitchen MIK-1
data.description: Mayur Indian Kitchen Restaurant - a beautiful home-style Indian restaurant with an open kitchen situated just opposite the Grand Hyatt and Taipei City hall on Renai and Keelung road intersection. We offer a variety of vegetarian and non-vegetarian Indian cuisine, with special weekend cuisine. We believe in serving the best to our guest, so we would love to listen to your choice, likes and dislikes. M.I.K.also provides customized cuisine restaurant apart from our versatile menu. See live cooking just in front of you.
data.address: 350-5, sec 1, Keelung Road opposite Grand Hyatt hotel, Xinyi District, Taipei 110 Taiwan

data.name: French Windows - British TeaHouse
data.description: French Windows Taipei is our first British Tea House inspire property—where a legendary 300 years’ tea brand “Twinings” superior tea experience awaits. You’ll find seasonal and artisanal tea varieties in our Tea Library, its stock with more than 200 different teas from the world, served by fine tea specialists. When tea time strikes in Taipei, locals and visitors alike love French Windows for a classic British Afternoon Tea under the iconic "Golden Age" -inspired brass chandeliers. Stunning triple-tier towers filled with a delicious assortment of sweet and savory treats grace French Windows tables daily. Spoil yourself with our seasonal à la carte menu, featuring classic dishes, signature spaghetti, ideal for power lunches or a light, sophisticated dinner. Choose from a fine selection of international cuisine, from hearty Italian meals to Continental favorites and Asian specialties.

address_obj.street1: No. 3, Aly. 18, Ln. 31, Sec. 5, Zhongxiao E. Rd., Xinyi Dist

data.address: No. 3, Aly. 18, Ln. 31, Sec. 5, Zhongxiao E. Rd., Xinyi Dist, Xinyi District, Taipei 110 Taiwan

data.name: Gustoso Italian Restaurant- Madison Taipei Hotel
data.description: REFINED FUN DINER GUSTOSO, which means yummy in Italian, believes that dining is all about experience. That is why at GUSTOSO a symphony of harmonious setting with textures, will leave you both satisfied and longing for more. Located on the second floor, GUSTOSO’s inconspicuous luxury will make you feel as if you were dining in a park surrounded by the wide and lush trees from the medians in the street. Our authentic Southern Italian cuisine brings people together with a festive touch that encourages guests to interact with each other. All bright, lively Mediterranean dishes consist only of fresh and the highest quality, local ingredients to amuse your palate, including risottos, house-made pasta, and thin crust pizza.

address_obj.street1: No. 331, Section 1, Dunhua South Road, Daan District

data.address: No. 331, Section 1, Dunhua South Road, Daan District, Da'an, Taipei 10685 Taiwan

data.name: Merlot Cafe & Bistro
data.description: Merlot Cafe & Bistro is a small but cozy restaurant located in the alley right next to the Gloria Prince Hotel near the corner of Minsheng E. Road and Linsen N. Road. We serve western and Italian cuisine and focus on using fresh ingredients to create "clean" flavors. We offer a nice selection of wine to compliment our food, have cold beers from different parts of the world, and some simple cocktails. Merlot Cafe & Bistro is quite small and can only accommodate 15~20 guests so making a reservation in advance is suggested. We are closed on Mondays. Stop by for a bite to eat and a drink, and chat with Bob in English. Bob is from California but has lived and worked in Taiwan now for 13 years.

data.name: Balle Balle Indian Restaurant
data.description: Punjabi Indian Cuisine with a wide variety of Tandoori Snacks, Main Courses in Vegetarian & Non Vegetarians. We offer tasty Indian food with friendly service. Healthy Fresh Indian Cuisine using finest ingredients and freshest products. Owner of Balle Balle Indian Restaurant & Bar opened the restaurant with the Intention of providing Ethnic Indian Punjabi Cuisine. Mr.Kant has assembled a highly skilled team of chefs representing Punjabi Cuisine from India. This is an intimate restaurant extending over a ground floor and basement floor for inviting private room for parties and events. If you are looking for fine dining with great ambiance and formal service with high cost to match look else where, We Assure to serve good Indian food, lightning fast service and budget friendly. Located in the Heart of City. On Intersection Of Bade Road & Guang fu North road. Walk able distance of 5 to 8 Mins from Sun yat Sen memorial Hall Exit 5. Check out for Photos for Dishes & Name card with Chinese address.
